Title: Long Sleeve Sequined Mother of the Brides Dress with Train

Featured-image: CD487-dustyrose-long-sleeve-sequined-mother-of-the-brides-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: A sequined bodice that features sheer long sleeves with accents of sequined overlays and piping on the cuffs. A floor length skirt with a court train and a simple sash at the wasit. The bodice extends into a scollaped peplum at the wasitline.
